data.title: Cannabis Advisory Committee Meeting in San Diego
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) today announced that the Cannabis Advisory Committee will hold its next meeting on Thursday, July 19, in San Diego. The Meeting Notice and Agenda and meeting materials have been posted to the Bureauâ€™s website and can be found here: http://bcc.ca.gov/about_us/committee_meetings.html.
